subject: UNITED NATIONS OFFICE
body:
UNITED NATIONS OFFICE
DEBT RECONCILIATION DEPARTMENT
405 East 42nd Street, New York, NY, 10017,USA
OUR REF: UN / US / 021.7XXVX / 901
YOUR REF:UNA / USA / 255-U7 / 2023
Attention: Beneficiary
                                  NOTICE OF PAYMENT.
Following the Resolution of the World Bank Economic Forum with the
Directors of International Monitoring Fund (IMF) passed at the United
Nations Assembly Conference held in Washington DC USA recently, It was
unanimously agreed that all outstanding debts relating to Share
Bond,Contract Payment, Lottery/Inheritance Fund owed to Foreign
Contractors and Corporate Individuals should be settle Immediately.
As one of the Beneficiaries affected in the list submitted to the
United Nations Assembly by the World Bank Auditors for consideration,
we hereby notify you that the sum of $12.8 million US Dollars has been
approved for you. 
Please furnish us with your full name, address and
Telephone number for immediate payment.
For your information we have only a few weeks to complete this payment
exercise, and upon receipt of your mail you will be notified by the
corresponding bank how you will receive your money.
We look forward to hearing from you soon
Robert Russell.
UN Audit Officer.

subject: Re: UNITED NATIONS OFFICE
body:
Hello Robert Russell,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised and thrilled to hear about this resolution from the United Nations Assembly Conference. It's a relief to know that such measures are being taken to settle debts.

Could you please provide more details about this? How was my name included in the list submitted by the World Bank Auditors? And what exactly does this approval of million US Dollars mean for me?

I'm looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Grant
